turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there, what would you like to do today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order four small pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 4 small pizzas from Bella Luna sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what are your choice of toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One with just cheese, one with just pepperoni, one meat lover's, and one supreme pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And I'd like all of those with gluten-free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 with cheese only, 1 with pepperoni only 1 meat lover and 1 supreme all with gluten free crust final order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok your total is 48 dollars is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: wonderful, your pizza are on order at the local Bella Luna pizzeria and will be ready for pickup in 30 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that will be it. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you are welcome, enjoy your pizza.
